metadata.title: CVE-2015-5303 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The TripleO Heat templates (tripleo-heat-templates), when deployed via thecommandline interface, allow remote attackers to spoof OpenStack Networkingmetadata requests by leveraging knowledge of the default value of theNeutronMetadataProxySharedSecret parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5303` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-tripleo-heat-templates - 5.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tripleo-heat-templates package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2.0-1').
